document_data.mainbody:
'''"Book of Cylinders"''' is a short adventure module for 6{{th}}–level players, collected in the anthology ''[[Candlekeep Mysteries]]'', where players help a [[grippli]] village under attack by evil [[yuan-ti]].
{{TOC limit|2}}
document_data.Synopsis: In [[1492 DR]], a group of [[adventurer]]s are hired by the [[Avowed]] to aid a [[grippli]] village in the [[Cloak Wood]], a major supplier of [[giant crab]] meat for [[Candlekeep]]. The adventurers discover that the grippli are caught in the crossfire between two groups of yuan-ti: a goodly faction worshiping a [[deity]] they call the [[Scaled Mother]], and a group of [[Sseth]]-worshipers hunting them down.
